pageContext.claim: “Every day, on average, CBC prevents 10 known or suspected terrorists from entering the United States.”
pageContext.analysis: Vice President Mike Pence made a similar claim that our friends at Politifact examined. In 2017, the government reported Homeland Security stopped about 7 people per day — not 10. Plus, Trump again used an incorrect acronym — Customs and Border Protection is CBP not CBC.
